attributes.additional_details: I think the government should ban uniforms in schools but enforce an appropriate dress code to make sure they can still look smart but express themselves to a certain extent.
attributes.background: I think the Government should allow pupils to wear their own clothing to their School. Uniform can often make the pupils insecure about their bodies as it is often quite compact. The uniform makes the pupils all look the same and they are unable to express their identity.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607158
